member.name: T:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.CredentialType
member.summary: Supported credential types for URL signing

member.name: F:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.CredentialType.None
member.summary: Agent's personal credentials are used.

member.name: F:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.CredentialType.ServiceAccountCredentials
member.summary: Google OAuth 2.0 credential for accessing protected resources using an access token.

member.name: F:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.CredentialType.ImpersonatedCredentials
member.summary: Allows a service account or user credential to impersonate a service account.

member.name: F:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.CredentialType.ComputeCredentials
member.summary: Google OAuth 2.0 credential for accessing protected resources using an access token.

member.name: F:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.CredentialType.GoogleCredentials
member.summary: Credential for authorizing calls using OAuth 2.0. It is a convenience wrapper that allows handling of different types of credentials (like Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.ServiceAccountCredential, Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.ComputeCredential or Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.UserCredential) in a unified way.

member.name: T:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.Input
member.summary: Input parameters.

member.name: P:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.Input.ProjectId
member.summary: Id of the project.

member.name: P:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.Input.BucketName
member.summary: Name for the bucket. If left empty NewGuid() method is used to create the bucket name.

member.name: P:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.Input.AddGuidToBucketName
member.summary: When enabled the Task will add guid to the end of the bucket name with NewGuid() method. This will make sure that the bucket name is unique.

member.name: P:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.Input.Location
member.summary: Location

member.name: P:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.Input.StorageClass
member.summary: Storage class for the bucket.

member.name: P:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.Input.CredentialJson
member.summary: Google Credentials in JSON format.

member.name: P:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.Input.CredentialFilePath
member.summary: Full path to the json file which has credentials for Google.

member.name: T:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.Result
member.summary: Result class

member.name: P:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.Result.BucketName
member.summary: Bucket name of the newly created bucket.

member.name: P:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.Result.Location
member.summary: Location of the bucket.

member.name: P:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.Result.StorageClass
member.summary: Storage class of the bucket.

member.name: P:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.Result.TimeCreated
member.summary: DateTime of the created bucket.

member.name: T:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Enums.StorageClassType
member.summary: Types of storage class used in Google Cloud Storage.

member.name: F:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Enums.StorageClassType.STANDARD
member.summary: Standard storage is best for data that is frequently accessed ("hot" data) and/or stored for only brief periods of time.

member.name: F:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Enums.StorageClassType.NEARLINE
member.summary: Nearline storage is a low-cost, highly durable storage service for storing infrequently accessed data.

member.name: F:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Enums.StorageClassType.COLDLINE
member.summary: Coldline storage is a very-low-cost, highly durable storage service for storing infrequently accessed data.

member.name: F:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Enums.StorageClassType.ARCHIVE
member.summary: Archive storage is the lowest-cost, highly durable storage service for data archiving, online backup, and disaster recovery.

member.name: T:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.GoogleCloudStorage
member.summary: Main class for the Task.

member.name: M:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket(Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket.Definitions.Input,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a bucket to Google Cloud Storage. [Documentation](https://tasks.frends.com/tasks/frends-tasks/Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.CreateBucket)
